title: driven data centres to lift demand for gensets in India: Cummins
description: Shveta Arya, Cummins Group's India region leader, said India was moving beyond data storage to power-intensive artificial intelligence (AI) workloads, increasing demand for reliable backup power.
content:
Synopsis
Shveta Arya, Cummins Group's India region leader, said India was moving beyond data storage to power-intensive artificial intelligence (AI) workloads, increasing demand for reliable backup power.

title: Black holes to be shown in action in first 3D movies created using AI
description: Experts in black hole astronomy and artificial intelligence will combine for the project at Heriot-Watt University.
content:
Kazunori Akiyama is joining Heriot-Watt University for the TomoGrav project, which is being funded through a £4 million fellowship.
He was previously involved in creating the first images of black holes, stellar bodies which are so dense nothing – in... [1945 chars]

description: Experts in black hole astronomy and artificial intelligence will combine for the project at Heriot-Watt University.
content:

title: Nunes to Newsmax: Trump-TAE Merger Biggest Deal Since Manhattan Project
description: Devin Nunes tells Newsmax that Trump Media and Technology Group's planned merger with a nuclear fusion company could reshape U.S. energy production and power the country's artificial intelligence future.
